abstract: Jacques Nasser, the former chief executive of Ford Motor, is back in the limelight as chairman of BHP Billiton, which is seeking to acquire Potash.
snippet: Jacques Nasser, the former chief executive of Ford Motor, is back in the limelight as chairman of BHP Billiton, which is seeking to acquire Potash.
lead_paragraph: 4:34 p.m. | Updated The takeover battle that has erupted over Potash puts a name from 1990s corporate America back in the limelight.

headline.main: Nasser: A Familar Name in Potash Battle
